segments.text: Thanks for hopping on. Our Pro plan would be twelve hundred monthly.
That's too high. We budgeted eight hundred and still need onboarding help.
I can drop base to a thousand if you commit to a year, and include white-glove setup.
Okay, but we need usage overages capped. Last vendor surprised us.
We'll cap overages at twenty percent and send alerts weekly.
Fine. Send the one-year contract at a thousand with capped overages.
Will do. I'll include onboarding dates for next week.
